title: Alduron
author: Alduron
content: Hello, I am happy to share information about AptosLaunch with you!(no investment advice) Aptos and Sui are new upcoming blockchains that use the Move language. AptosLaunch is one of the 12 Projects that have been with Aptos since Testnet. The Devs (I am just a Volunteer) have delivered way more than expected and displayed on the Roadmap so far:Within the last 2 Months- ALT got listed on KuCoin, MEXC, and DigiFinex- one of the first compound staking contracts on Aptos was introduced for ALT- The Spaceport Hackathon was announced, and many high-quality Projects and VCs joinedA lot of Projects applied to IDO on AptosLaunch, but only the best applicants will be picked. For the first batch that is planned to launch in 2023 Q1 2 Projects were confirmed so far:NuigurumiNFT (The First Play to Earn NFT project on Aptos)Abel Finance (First Cross-Chain Lending Platform on Aptos and Sui)Allocation will depend on a couple factors like the amount of ALT you hold.https://doc.aptoslaunch.io/products/launchpad-tier-systemshttps://doc.aptoslaunch.io/products/aptoslaunch-tiersPlease make sure to only visit aptoslaunch.io and the official Discord channel to DYOR, there are a couple fake sites and a fake telegram. AptosLaunch has a great community with over 80k users on discord and many Volunteers. https://discord.gg/wHHTvDRtI will post updates, if you have questions I will try to answer them.
